Magister Rovia:
I am Magister Rovia.
This area shares a border with Elmore, so of course it shares many similarities with that war-torn land. The whole place is like night and day compared to our Elven homeland.
The houses here are rough and rambling, and the people are louts! They simply have no understanding of subtlety! Though, I should be grateful, they say it's even worse in Elmore.
The Elves there must to frustrated...
